6900db0d87e950987c4724f8.name: 👋 Welcome!
6900db0d87e950987c4724f8.desc:
**Overview**

Welcome to our public roadmap! Thanks to your support on Alter Ego, we have had an incredibly exciting and rewarding Alpha launch. With this Trello board, we want to involve the community in our development processes by providing you all with more information on what’s coming, when you can expect them, and a status check on how development is going.

‌

**Links**

[Alter Ego](https://www.roblox.com/games/78515341506665/ALTER-EGO-ALPHA-TEST "‌")

[Discord](http://discord.gg/playalterego "‌")

[X (Twitter)](https://x.com/play_alterego "‌")

[Roblox Community](https://www.roblox.com/communities/4914494/Paradoxum-Games#!/about "‌")

6900e04b951e98672a7ec631.name: ⚠️ Disclaimer: Everything is subject to change.

6900da7abdd75c6e6e2a8ff6.name: Lobby NPCs
6900da7abdd75c6e6e2a8ff6.desc:
Interactable characters to bring more life and story into Alter Ego. These NPCs will give players a chance to explore the lore and worldbuilding of our game - making downtime more engaging between matches.

Over time, we’ll be able to expand this system and update our characters to reflect new events, storylines, and signaling future updates, allowing the Labyrinth to grow alongside the game itself.

6900daa2d34c1fa8a4df15ef.name: Ragdolls
6900daa2d34c1fa8a4df15ef.desc: Ragdoll physics for characters to make world interactivity feel more dynamic and immersive. Certain abilities will make players ragdoll, with their character movements interacting naturally in the environment.

6900da9f51173f1b0acd0c54.name: Inventory UX Improvements
6900da9f51173f1b0acd0c54.desc: A second pass at the inventory UI with clearer support for future additions, such as a section that clearly displays player’s Sols, as well as more text labels to help navigating the menu easier.

6900dab8a3eda9692a6493e4.name: News Feed
6900dab8a3eda9692a6493e4.desc: Easy way to stay up-to-date with the latest updates, directly in the game.

6900df74a346c37c082c2f97.name: Tooltips
6900df74a346c37c082c2f97.desc: Adding in helpful tool tips throughout the game to guide new and experienced players. Notably: hovering over passive abilities in the game will offer explanations on what they do, making learning the game easier and more intuitive.

69012035b2d3a1dfe9a4fa1d.name: Escape Hatches
69012035b2d3a1dfe9a4fa1d.desc: A last minute getaway for when a survivor has long outlived their teammates, offering a risky but rewarding alternative to traditional escapes.

690254cd235c368d1cc041df.name: Ego Transformation Animation
690254cd235c368d1cc041df.desc: Egos will play a transformation from their survivor form on spawn.

68ffc8a30a1f0039e00f398f.name: Survivor: Toothy
68ffc8a30a1f0039e00f398f.desc:
Our first dedicated Healer character in the game - **Toothy**.

Toothy will be equipped with two active abilities and one passive, a new layer of teamwork will be added into the survivor gameplay experience. One of his abilities is an AOE heal, allowing teammates to recover mid-match. Expect a big shift in the meta.

690253a9de0ede3e37dc4f97.name: Round Balancing
690253a9de0ede3e37dc4f97.desc:
- Extend round timer
- Add 1-2 extra generators
- Bloodlust intermission before gates open
- Redo generator placement nodes to support more randomized generator types during layout selection

68ffcadaa2d81eeae1e17aad.name: Hack Minigame
68ffcadaa2d81eeae1e17aad.desc: Introducing our first post-Alpha generator expansion - the Hack minigame. Players will be given a sequence of arrow inputs and will need to input them correctly.

6900da70a4966cd3483a161f.name: Console Compatibility
6900da70a4966cd3483a161f.desc: Expanded support for Roblox on Playstation / Xbox. Controls + UX will be optimized for a TV setting.

6900da801bd7b0e82cee0c1a.name: Developer Credits Page
6900da801bd7b0e82cee0c1a.desc: Credit for developers' work on the game.

6900da9626f170f14545bbc2.name: Status Effect System Revamp
6900da9626f170f14545bbc2.desc: A backend rewrite of our Status Effects system to empower us to make cooler characters in the future.

6900daaa8fca5e894c37443f.name: Improved Mobile UX
6900daaa8fca5e894c37443f.desc: Meaningful improvements to the greater mobile experience by improving much of the UI / controls on phones.

69012519d5c6d6f486d400a6.name: Roster Progression
69012519d5c6d6f486d400a6.desc: Expand your roster as you play utilizing Sols. Straightforward, rewarding way to grow your lineup and experience what each character has to offer in the game.

68ffc8a4d110a79f487409f6.name: Ego: The Maw
68ffc8a4d110a79f487409f6.desc:
Commander’s Ego: **The Maw**.

Focused on disbanding groups of survivors rather than a singular target. The Maw can control the labyrinth and turn the tide of a match - survivors will have to adapt their playstyle to survive.

6900dcd918b7ac4ac81b0e75.name: Emotes
6900dcd918b7ac4ac81b0e75.desc: Express yourself further with emotes! Show off against Egos in-game or dance with friends in the lobby.

6901241341ac99a7e079987c.name: Taunts
6901241341ac99a7e079987c.desc: Sound cues usable for drawing attention away from other survivors - or simply just to tease the Ego.

6900e436218d9132b0599602.name: Map Consumables
6900e436218d9132b0599602.desc: Our first step in the long-term vision of consumables in Alter Ego; consumables are limited-use items that give players a temporary boost or advantage during matches.
